decision_conditions: The proposed development constitutes permitted development by virtue of the provisions of:
Schedule 2, Part 2, Class E of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Schedule 2, Part 15, Class B of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The parts of the development deemed to constitute permitted development under Schedule 2, Part 15, Class B of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended). may only be undertaken by a statutory undertaker as defined within the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
description: Installation of 2no. rapid and 1no. fast EV chargers to serve 6no. EV charging bays together with ancillary electrical equipment in accordance with permitted development legislation (Application for a Certificate of Lawful Development for a Proposed Development).
site_name: LAND ADJACENT TO 33 BRAMBLES FARM DRIVE
